conversations.conversation:
W & Z Machinery Sales is a leading provider of Plastic Injection Molding & Auxiliary Machinery, serving the needs of companies in many industries. Our equipment is manufactured by our factory in China, established in 1998. We provide quality, value-priced plastic molding & auxiliary machines with exceptional service. Whatever your needs are, please call us for a free estimate. We maintain an extensive inventory and will likely be able to supply your machine immediately.
;;http://www.wzmachinerysystems.com/;
